page.title: 01Gazetteer.
page.content: This block 05480381 was done in conjunction with block 05520381 as the dividing between them ran down the middle of Station Road.Sutton is situated on England's east coast,3 miles south of{Mablethorpe}and 15 miles north of{Skegness.Trusthorpe}is 1 mile north of Sutton and{Sandilands is 1 mile south.Sutton is a village to which a lot of people retire.It is also a holiday resort.It gets very busy around June.We have a permanent populatio of about 1900 but there are lots of houses which are mainly holiday homes.We have one main street of shops.We have a nice beach which is covered in sand but sometimes we get stones and pebble washed up on the nice place to live.
